content.text: Jerry DiCanio, is a fictional character played by Matt DeCaro in the television series The Office.

Jerry works in the warehouse. During the basketball game between the office and the warehouse, Michael called a "flagrant personal intentional foul" on Jerry to end the game, announcing the team from the office as the winners. Darryl, Roy, and Lonnie however were none-too-receptive with Michael's decision and, through intimidation, had it reversed.
The organizational chart in the episode Did I Stutter? shows Jerry's last name as DiCanio.
Jerry was revealed to haveÂ died in 2012. Andy's 'Fail' compilation was dedicated to him.

elements.text: Jerry shares his name with NBC vice president Jerry DiCanio.
